text.name: info6
text.text: Sound: Analog stereo (Dolby Pro Logic II)

text.name: info9
text.text: The Nintendo GameCube is a sixth-generation console, designed

text.name: info10
text.text: to compete with Sony's PlayStation 2 and Microsoft's Xbox. It is

text.name: info11
text.text: the first Nintendo console to use optical discs as its primary storage medium.
